sentence.Network_en: The trainers have a programme to teach them vocational skills.
sentence.Network_cn: 培训师计划教他们一些职业技能。

sentence.Network_en: Tracking assigns some students to college prep and others to vocational programs.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照能力，一些学生被分到大学预科班，另一些则被分到职业培训班。

sentence.Network_en: They will be encouraged to mix academic A-levels with vocational qualifications.
sentence.Network_cn: 将鼓励他们在取得优秀学习成绩的同时也要获得一定的职业资质。

entry.def: Vocational training and skills are the training and skills needed for a particular job or profession.

example.ex: ...a course designed to provide vocational training in engineering...
example.tran: 工程学的职业培训课程

example.ex: Vocational courses are often given more respect and funding than arts or philosophy.
example.tran: 职业技术类课程通常能够获得比艺术或哲学类课程更多的重视和资助。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relation to a vocation or occupation; especially providing or undergoing training in special skills;

sentences.sentence: "vocational students learning to repair a motor"

auth_sentence.content: Training and vocational opportunities are few and far between.
auth_sentence.res_content: Training and vocational opportunities are few and far between.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Training and vocational opportunities are few and far between.

auth_sentence.content: Fish has also started a vocational training program for mothers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fish has also started a vocational training program for mothers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fish has also started a vocational training program for mothers.

auth_sentence.content: Private industry should build more vocational programs to recruit workers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Private industry should build more vocational programs to recruit workers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Private industry should build more vocational programs to recruit workers.

Sentence.sentence: Traditional vocational training in public high schools is gradually declining, stranding thousands of young people who seek training for a craft without going to college.

jushi.english: The company will provide you with vocational training.
jushi.chinese: 公司将为你提供职业培训。
